metadata.Title: CVE-2023-41360 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in FRRouting FRR through 9.0. bgpd/bgp_packet.c can read the initial byte of the ORF header in an ahead-of-stream situation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-41360` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

quagga - 0.99.24.1-2ubuntu1.4+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: sbeattie> the quagga project was renamed to frr

criterions.comment: quagga package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.99.24.1-2ubuntu1.4+esm1').
